articles.description: Lando Norris says he has a "big job" on his hands to try to recover in the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix from his crash in qualifying.
articles.title: Saudi Arabian GP: Lando Norris pessimistic of podium chances after qualifying crash

articles.description: Ollie Watkins has a message for his manager Unai Emery - he wants to be starting the biggest games after he inspires Villa's win over Newcastle.
articles.title: Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins channelled 'anger' in 'dynamite' display against Newcastle United

articles.description: Debutant Lei Peifan stuns defending champion Kyren Wilson by fighting back from 6-2 down to triumph 10-9 as the 'Crucible curse' strikes again.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025: Kyren Wilson loses to Lei Peifan

articles.description: England's Tommy Fleetwood is three shots adrift of leader Kim Si-woo heading into Sunday's final round of the PGA Tour's RBC Heritage in South Carolina.
articles.title: RBC Heritage PGA Tour: Tommy Fleetwood in contention as Kim Si-woo leads by one

articles.description: After Nico O'Reilly's contribution helps Manchester City to a crucial win in their chase for Champions League football, Pep Guardiola has reason to be grateful.
articles.title: Everton 0-2 Man City: Pep Guardiola hails 'big win' in chase for Champions League

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka takes a photograph on court of a disputed ball mark during her quarter-final victory over Elise Mertens at the Stuttgart Open.
articles.title: Stuttgart Open: Aryna Sabalenka takes photo of disputed ball call in win, Jelena Ostapenko beats Iga Swiatek to reach semi-finals

articles.description: Bournemouth manager Andoni Iraola gave a coy response when asked about his future after the frustrating goalless draw at Crystal Palace, but supporters remain desperate for him to extend his stay at Vitality Stadium.
articles.title: Andoni Iraola guides Bournemouth to another record - can Cherries keep him?

articles.description: Barcelona recover from 3-1 down to win 4-3 at home to Celta Vigo and extend their lead at the top of La Liga to seven points.
articles.title: Barcelona 4-3 Celta Vigo: Raphinha's 98th-minute penalty wins thriller

articles.description: Aston Villa boost their Champions League hopes with victory over Newcastle, but who else is in the battle for the European places?
articles.title: Champions League: Which clubs are in the race for European football?

articles.description: England score nine tries to hammer Scotland in Leicester and set up a Women's Six Nations Grand Slam-decider with France at Allianz Stadium next Saturday.
articles.title: England 59-7 Scotland: Red Roses set up Women's Six Nations Grand Slam-decider with France
